Captain America: Civil War.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

Spider-man: Homecoming.description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man.

The Incredible Hulk.description: The Incredible Hulk is an American television series based on the Marvel Comics character The Hulk.

Spider-man.description: pider-Man, also known as Spider-Man: The Animated Series, is an American animated television series based on the Marvel Comics superhero of the same name.
